attributes.action: The re-introduction of capital punishment (The Death Penalty)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we wish to see the re-introduction of the death penalty for crimes of murder. where there is a unanimous verdict from a jury and the appeal. they should be placed on a death row for 10 years to allow for any advancements in forensics to prove any innocents. we are aware that this goes against the EU constitution.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/ref-on-death/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
